isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Daycab

step1.para:
Remove passenger air bucket seat, fixed passenger seat, or driver air bucket seat, refer to
SEATS
. For removing passenger air bucket seat, refer to Remove Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Daycab. For removing fixed passenger seat, refer to Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Daycab. For removing driver air bucket seat, refer to Remove Driver Air Bucket Seat on Daycab.

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 74 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) securing shoulder belt (Item 2) to the cab, passenger side shown. Lay the torx head bolt and shoulder belt out of the way on the cab floor and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 3), remove seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Remove passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) from the cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 74. Passenger Side Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Daycab

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. PASSENGER SIDE CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side corner and side interior trim panel on Daycab.
